edu.cnm.deepdive.worldofwardrobe

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.worldofwardrobe.MainActivity

  • public class MainActivity
extends Object
    Main class with android's pre-coded viewpager a place holder, pager adapter and methods to view 6 fragments.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MainActivity.PlaceholderFragment
      A placeholder fragment containing a simple view.
      class  MainActivity.SectionsPagerAdapter
      A FragmentPagerAdapter that returns a fragment corresponding to one of the sections/tabs/pages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ItemsDatabase getDatabase()
      Create database if null and then insert raw query string for default wardrobe_name and item_type_name.
      protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Creates what applies to all fragments which is the pager adapter, view pager, and floating buttons.
      void selectedItem(long id, long type)
      Pass the item ID and item type ID from the ItemPicAdapter for the outfitFragment instance to prior to instantiating outfitFragment.
      void switchTab(int position)
      Created this method for the Wardrobe Adapter to jump the fragments when user select a wardrobe.

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Creates what applies to all fragments which is the pager adapter, view pager, and floating buttons.

      • switchTab

        public void switchTab(int position)
        Created this method for the Wardrobe Adapter to jump the fragments when user select a wardrobe.
        Parameters:
        position - position is the page number for the fragment

      • getDatabase

        public ItemsDatabase getDatabase()
        Create database if null and then insert raw query string for default wardrobe_name and item_type_name.
        Returns:
        return a database

      • selectedItem

        public void selectedItem(long id,
                         long type)
        Pass the item ID and item type ID from the ItemPicAdapter for the outfitFragment instance to prior to instantiating outfitFragment.
        Parameters:
        id - item ID from the item database
        type - item type ID from the item database
